rules.name: Data Processing Lawful Basis
rules.description: Contract must specify lawful basis for personal data processing

messages.fail: No clear lawful basis for data processing identified
messages.warn: Lawful basis mentioned but may need clarification
messages.pass: Clear lawful basis for data processing specified

rules.remediation: Add clause: 'Data processing is necessary for performance of this contract pursuant to GDPR Article 6(1)(b)'

rules.name: Data Subject Rights
rules.description: Contract must address data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.)

messages.fail: Data subject rights not adequately addressed
messages.warn: Some data subject rights mentioned but incomplete coverage
messages.pass: Comprehensive data subject rights provisions included

rules.remediation: Add comprehensive data subject rights clause covering Articles 15-22

rules.name: Data Protection Officer Contact
rules.description: Contract should include DPO contact details where applicable

messages.fail: No Data Protection Officer contact information provided
messages.pass: Data Protection Officer contact details included

rules.remediation: Include DPO contact: 'Data Protection Officer contact: dpo@company.com'

rules.name: International Data Transfers
rules.description: Contracts involving international transfers must have adequate safeguards

messages.fail: International data transfers lack adequate safeguards
messages.warn: Transfer safeguards mentioned but may need strengthening
messages.pass: Adequate safeguards for international transfers in place

rules.remediation: Add standard contractual clauses or adequacy decision reference for international transfers

rules.name: Data Breach Notification
rules.description: Contract must specify data breach notification procedures and timelines

messages.fail: Data breach notification procedures not specified or contain vague timing
messages.warn: Breach notification mentioned but timeline unclear
messages.pass: Clear data breach notification procedures with specific timelines

rules.remediation: Add: 'Processor shall notify Controller within 72 hours of becoming aware of any personal data breach'

rules.name: Data Minimization Principle
rules.description: Processing should be limited to what is necessary for specified purposes

messages.pass: Data minimization and purpose limitation addressed

rules.remediation: Add: 'Processing shall be limited to data adequate, relevant and necessary for the specified purposes'

rules.name: Retention Periods
rules.description: Contract must specify data retention periods and deletion procedures

messages.fail: No specific data retention periods or deletion procedures
messages.warn: Retention mentioned but periods are vague
messages.pass: Clear data retention periods and deletion procedures specified

rules.remediation: Specify exact retention periods: 'Personal data will be deleted within 30 days of contract termination'

rules.name: Data Processing Agreement
rules.description: Processor contracts must include Article 28 requirements

messages.fail: Missing Article 28 data processing agreement requirements
messages.warn: Some Article 28 requirements present but incomplete

rules.remediation: Include full Article 28 data processing agreement with processor obligations

rules.name: Security Measures
rules.description: Contract must specify technical and organizational security measures

messages.fail: Insufficient technical and organizational security measures
messages.warn: Some security measures mentioned but may need enhancement
messages.pass: Comprehensive technical and organizational security measures

rules.remediation: Specify detailed security measures including encryption, access controls, and incident response

rules.name: Supervisory Authority Cooperation
rules.description: Contract should address cooperation with supervisory authorities

messages.fail: No provisions for supervisory authority cooperation

rules.remediation: Add: 'Parties shall cooperate with supervisory authorities in accordance with GDPR Article 31'

rules.name: Liability and Indemnification
rules.description: Contract must address GDPR liability and compensation provisions

messages.fail: GDPR liability and compensation provisions missing
messages.warn: Liability mentioned but GDPR-specific provisions unclear
messages.pass: Clear GDPR liability and compensation provisions

rules.remediation: Include GDPR Article 82 liability provisions and data subject compensation mechanisms
